name: OptimizeSNP
short_description:
Program apply linear programming to minimize the number of microarrays and hybridization experiments that need to be undertaken in order to cover most of the predicted expressed SNPs.Dependencies:. 1) mampl.exe must be in system PATH  2) CPLEX 12.2 must be installed. cplexamp.exe must be in system PATH

mampl.exe can be obtained from any program containing AMPL. I obtained AMPL from trial version of MOSEK at http://www.mosek.com/. CPLEX 12.0 can be obtained from http://www-01.ibm.com/software/integration/optimization/cplex-optimizer/. A free acadamic license can be obtained by filling out IBM academic initiative application.
summary: Selects SNPs and samples with known genotypes for microarray design
